channel.title: CVE Feed for Typora -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Typora -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-2317|2023-08-19T05:35:36.603Z -- typora -- typora
item.description: DOM-based XSS in updater/update.html in Typora before 1.6.7 on Windows and Linux allows a crafted markdown file to run arbitrary JavaScript code in the context of Typora main window via loading typora://app/typemark/updater/update.html in <embed> tag. This vulnerability can be exploited if a user opens a malicious markdown file in Typora, or copies text from a malicious webpage and paste it into Typora.
